name: Ringmaster (2022 Team 5)
description:
You're just a regular person going about your day trying to do some quick chores around town on your way to work. It would be a shame if some sumo wrestlers decided to suddenly challenge you to a ring match in a moving ring, wouldn't it? But that's just silly, that would never happen... unless..?

RINGMASTERS!!! Use WASD or arrow keys to avoid your persistent sumo-wrestling pursuers! Mouse to swing briefcase, deflecting enemies out of the arena, and out-of-sight *poof*
